title: Modern Family Home Grote Berg
description:
Grote Berg, Curaçao

Work where you vacation. Live where others escape.
Bai Pe Real Estate proudly presents this move-in-ready modern family home located in the desirable neighborhood of Grote Berg, Curaçao. Situated on 715 m² of owned land, this property combines contemporary comfort, privacy, and strong investment potential — making it ideal for both personal living and income generation.
Designed for relaxed Caribbean living, the home features open, airy spaces, a private swimming pool, and a detached studio perfect for rental income, guests, or a home office. With its recent price reduction and turnkey condition, this property represents a rare opportunity in today’s market.
